start.question: What kind of insight are you looking for?

categorical.question: Do you want to compare absolute or relative values?

time-series.question: Do you want to highlight trends or individual points?

numerical.question: Are you exploring relationships or distributions?

bar-chart.description: Bar charts are great for comparing absolute values across categories.

stacked-bar-chart.description: Stacked bar charts show relative contributions to the total.

line-chart.description: Line charts are excellent for visualizing trends over time.

scatter-plot.description: Scatter plots are useful for identifying relationships between variables.

histogram.description: Histograms are best for understanding the distribution of numerical data.
